text: RT @geraldmalloySC I had the honor of welcoming @KamalaHarris to Hartsville this afternoon. Thank you for making the Pee Dee a priority! The Pee Dee appreciates you listening to their voices. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D-5rXtfXUAIN2Ig.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D-5rXteXoAAviIS.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D-5rXtmWwAE0e1g.jpg

The Chicago Defender has chronicled more than a century of our nation's history — its contribution to social and political change is unparalleled. Although no longer in print, I know they will continue to tell our stories, our way.
https://chicago.suntimes.com/business/2019/7/5/20683442/chicago-defender-ends-print-edition-digital-only-platform
Woo-hoo! Congratulations to the @USWNT on their World Cup win. Your persistence on and off the field inspires girls and women everywhere to dream big, fight hard, and win. #FIFAWWC #OneNationOneTeam

Congrats Team USA 🇺🇸 #WorldCup2019 Champions!

The Women’s National Team showed us their greatness - now show them the money. #fairpay

RT @RashidaTlaib But @CBP agents I spoke to said no amount of money will fix this crisis. 

One agent said: "Stop throwing money at this. It's not working." 

He also said: "This is not what I was trained to do." (meaning separating children from their mothers)
#CloseTheCamps https://twitter.com/ryangrim/status/1147858096489996288 QT @ryangrim This is a minor point, but if Border Patrol’s reason for mistreating immigrants was actually not having enough money, why do they keep the cells so frigid? It costs a lot of money to keep people shivering in camps in the desert.

Ok everyone, planning to take a few days of rest within the next few months and am sourcing a few ideas.

What’s your favorite US National Park to visit? 🏞

(Any tips for visiting said park also welcome!)

“I had watched for many years and seen how a few rich families held much of Argentina's wealth and power in their hands. So the government brought in an eight hour working day, sickness pay and fair wages to give poor workers a fair go.”

- Evita Perón

Don't forget: this week a federal court will hear arguments in a case that could repeal the ACA and strip health insurance from almost 20 million Americans.
 
We've been through this before, and we will fight this assault on Americans' right to health care. Make your voice heard.

At this point we shouldn’t even be asking for #EqualPay for the #USWMNT - we should demand they be paid at least twice as much 😉 https://twitter.com/nrarmour/status/1147915148549472256 QT @nrarmour US fans now chanting "Equal pay! Equal pay!" A reminder that the entire #USWNT is suing US Soccer, and Pinoe lit FIFA up yesty for its abysmal treatment of the women's game.

The fight of Black women has always been fueled and grounded in faith and belief in what is possible. 

It’s why Sojourner spoke. 
Why Mae flew.
Why Rosa and Claudette sat.
Why Maya wrote.
Why Fannie organized.
Why Shirley ran. 

And why I am a candidate for President of the U.S.

RT @TheDemCoalition "At this point we shouldn’t even be asking for #EqualPay for the #USWMNT - we should demand they be paid at least twice as much," wrote @AOC

#USAUSAUSA

RT @saikatc .@AOC, @RashidaTlaib, @AyannaPressley and @IlhanMN voted against the House bill because they believed McConnell would go back on his 'promise' to Pelosi that he'd pass the House bill. They believed pre-compromising based on McConnell's word was a naive strategy. They were right. https://twitter.com/joshjame/status/1147615395018354688 QT @joshjame Speaker Pelosi says ⁦⁦@AOC⁩, ⁦@IlhanMN⁩, ⁦@AyannaPressley⁩ and ⁦⁦@RashidaTlaib “have their public whatever and their Twitter world. But they didn’t have any following. They’re four people and that’s how many votes they got.” https://www.nytimes.com/2019/07/06/opinion/sunday/nancy-pelosi-pride-parade.html

🏆🏆🏆 https://twitter.com/espnfc/status/1147912609842257923 QT @ESPNFC Two-time World Cup Champion. Golden Boot Winner.

Right now, access to reproductive health is under attack in states across America. It is not alarmist to say that women will die because of these restrictive policies — because we’ve seen it happen before. As president, I will work to stop these policies before they become law.

Shirley Chisholm paved the way for me and the more than 20 Black women serving in Congress today. It’s great to see her getting the recognition she deserves.

We should honor her legacy by passing my bill to place a statue of her in the U.S. Capitol. https://www.nytimes.com/2019/07/06/sunday-review/shirley-chisholm-monument-film.html

Faith plays such an important role in my life and my campaign. I’ve been saying it since I announced my run for president: I’m going to walk by faith, not by sight. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1147869647552811008/img/AVpof1G3KSaw7Lez.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1147869647552811008/vid/320x320/S1w7yHFT9f1xMzls.mp4?tag=13
The 2020 presidential election is a fight not only for the soul of our country, this is also a fight that is borne out of love for country — and this is a fight we will win.

The business model of our health care system is about making as much money as possible regardless of the suffering that profiteering creates.

Our job: fight to save Philadelphia's Hahnemann Hospital and pass Medicare for All to end the greed denying health care to millions. https://twitter.com/awgaffney/status/1146719283671646208 QT @awgaffney This hospital is closing not because it is not needed (17,000 inpatient stays in 2017; 2/3 black/Latino patients) but because it is unprofitable.  In the US, which hospitals expand and beautify, & which disappear, is contingent on which can turn a profit.
 https://www.inquirer.com/health/hahnemann-hospital-emergency-room-crowded-20190702.html

Our plan: Cancel student debt. Make Wall Street pay for it. Free 45 million Americans from $1.6 trillion in loans. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D-khvIfX4AIMkQu.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1146476306428846080/vid/320x320/cWfEa853SX4wCMYb.mp4?tag=13

RT @mPinoe WE READY 👊 @DrinkBODYARMOR http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1145769285349826562/pu/img/VT2avlqdcfFg7h9a.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1145769285349826562/pu/vid/320x320/K6p4tBUNZkxt7y_B.mp4?tag=10

I’m proud to stand with all the Pennsylvania elected officials, unions and workers who are standing up to fight the corporate greed that is destroying our health care system. It is time for Medicare for All. https://twitter.com/joshshapiropa/status/1147868795555516417 QT @JoshShapiroPA Hahnemann Hospital is set to close because its investment-banker-owner can’t turn a buck on the life saving hospital in Philly. He declared bankruptcy and hopes the fire sale can begin soon so he can move on—leaving patients, med students & 2,500 employees to fend for themselves.

RT @KristenClarkeJD 50 yrs ago, Shirley Chisholm began her service as the first Black woman in Congress.

She was often frozen out by men and alienated by the feminist movement. 

Chisholm's courage helped create a pathway for the 20 Black women in Congress today. 
https://www.nytimes.com/2019/07/06/sunday-review/shirley-chisholm-monument-film.html

RT @kimmurphy How did hundreds of migrant kids end up crowded and miserable at a Border Patrol station in Clint, Texas? We set out on a joint project with @elpasotimes to find out. What we found was disturbing. https://www.nytimes.com/interactive/2019/07/06/us/migrants-border-patrol-clint.html

A nation is great when it lives its values. And right now, our nation has an immigration policy that is designed to maximize cruelty toward our immigrant communities. Cuando un billonario ataca a Bernie es pq sabe que la agenda de Bernie te beneficia a ti, no a los billonarios. @BernieSanders @Latinos4Bernie https://twitter.com/berniesanders/status/1147523450908610560 QT @BernieSanders Jamie Dimon is attacking our agenda.

We must right what is wrong with public health policy and pass #MedicareForAll. 

We must pass my maternal mortality bill so Black women are taken seriously when they arrive at the doctor.

We must treat access to clean drinking water like what it should be — a fundamental right.
We all want a country where everyone—not just the wealthy—can take care of their families and participate in our democracy. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D-4sP6bW4AMsZoh.jpg

RT @RoKhanna Do not dismiss @AOC for casting lonely votes. Would anyone trivialize @RepBarbaraLee for voting against the 2002 AUMF? I voted yes for the House bill & no on the Senate. But I am glad the body has voices of moral dissent. History proves that dissent provokes reflection & change. https://twitter.com/aoc/status/1147668951834476545 QT @AOC That public “whatever” is called public sentiment.

And wielding the power to shift it is how we actually achieve meaningful change in this country. https://twitter.com/joshjame/status/1147615395018354688

RT @ValaAfshar Before you speak to me about religion, first show it to me in how you treat people. Before you tell me how much you love God, show me how much you love his children. 

In the end, I'm not as interested in what you have to tell as in how you choose to live and give. —@CoryBooker http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D-4JVN5XYAMqq7D.jpg

That's a lie.

- There were 96 price increases for every cut during 2018
- Drug prices increased 10.5% in the last 6 months
- The prices of 104 drugs rose by 13.1% on average last week

When we win, we won't wait for drug companies to end their greed. We will end it for them. https://twitter.com/realDonaldTrump/status/1147856061006786560 QT @realDonaldTrump Last year was the first in 51 years where prescription drug prices actually went down, but things have been, and are being, put in place that will drive them down substantially. If Dems would work with us in a bipartisan fashion, we would get big results very fast!
